thread.title: 'Koffee With Karan': Varun Dhawan gifts Alia Bhatt a 'vibrator'
thread.title_full: 'Koffee With Karan': Varun Dhawan gifts Alia Bhatt a 'vibrator' - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: 'Koffee With Karan': Varun Dhawan gifts Alia Bhatt a 'vibrator'
text:
Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan on 'Koffee With Karan'. All pics/Star World India Twitter account 
Bollywood actors Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt graced the couch in the latest episode of 'Koffee With Karan' to promote their upcoming film 'Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya'. From Varun Dhawan confessing to watching porn to the actor gifting Alia Bhatt a 'vibrator', the episode was a laugh riot!

Karan Johar on 'Koffee With Karan' 
When Karan Johar asked Varun Dhawan what does he watch most on the internet, Varun Dhawan first said, "UFC fights." On being prodded further by KJo, Varun admitted to watching 'porn'.
Later, Varun Dhawan gifted a hair dryer to Alia Bhatt and said, "This turns her on." To which Karan Johar asked, "That sounds very suspicious. What is it?"
Alia Bhatt replied, "It's a hair dryer. But why is it only vibrating? Why is no air coming out of it?"
An amused Varun Dhawan said, "She said it. I didn't say it."
Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan on 'Koffee With Karan'
